== Architectecture Bootstrapping BOF ==

=== status of architectures for hoary hedgehog ===

* supported: amd64, i386, powerpc
* in the archive: ia64
* bootstrapped outside the archive: sparc (currently needs both these lines:)
** deb http://people.ubuntu.com/~fabbione/sparc /
** deb http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/ dists/hoary/main/binary-i386/
* under consideration by some people, not committed:
** Mips: JeffWaugh, LaMontJones
** hppa: LaMontJones, others
